group.title: React介紹 從0開始 #01
group.author: Iris Chew
group.excerpt: React - A JavaScript library for building user interfaces.

group.title: JavaScript Function Invocation #11
group.author: Iris Chew
group.excerpt: JavaScript variables can belong to the local or global scope.Global variables can be made local (private) with closures.

group.title: JavaScript Function Closures #10
group.author: Iris Chew
group.excerpt: The code inside a function is not executed when the function is defined.The code inside a function is executed when the function is invoked. It is common to use the term "call a function" instead of "invoke a function".

group.title: JavaScript Function Parameters #9
group.author: Iris Chew
group.excerpt: A JavaScript function does not perform any checking on parameter values (arguments).

group.title: JavaScript Function Definitions #8
group.author: Iris Chew
group.excerpt: A JavaScript function is a block of code designed to perform a particular task.

group.title: JavaScript Data Types #7
group.author: Iris Chew
group.excerpt: JavaScript variables can hold many data types.
